Token.Abstract: Instances of RKAttributeMapping define a transformation of data between an attribute value on source object and an attribute value on a destination object within an object mapping.
Creates and returns a new attribute mapping specifying that data is to be read from a given key path on a source object and set to a given key path on a destination object.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path on the source object from which to read the data being mapped.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path on the destination object on which to set the mapped data.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A newly created attribute mapping object that is ready to be added to an object mapping.
